text: Allene Roberts Cochran (September 1, 1928 â€“ May 9, 2019) was an American actress. She was born in Fairfield, Alabama. Her first movie role was The Red House (1947) starring Rory Calhoun, Julie London and Edward G. Robinson. She starred in Knock on Any Door,Silver, Alain and Elizabeth Ward, ed., Film Noir: An Encyclopedic Reference to the American Style, The Overlook Press, Woodstock, NY, Third Edition, 1992 p. 161-162 Union Station and Bomba on Panther Island. Roberts died on May 9, 2019 in Huntsville, Alabama at the age of 90.Allene Roberts Cochran ==References== ==Other websites== * *Allene Roberts at the American Film Institute *Allene Roberts: True to her roots Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:People from Fairfield, Alabama Category:Actors from Alabama
title: Allene Roberts
